title: Person of Interest - Simulation 336 742 [PART 1/2] (04x11)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: I'm so glad you put these up, this is my favorite episode and nobody gets it when I say 'coolly delivered sadistic threat'.

“What’s the point of saving the world if you can’t enjoy it?”

I love finch and his character so much, root actually says this to him in the real thing, and not the simulated version
I would like to see the shortened and last simulation where the machine just describes what the characters would have said.
This was the first whole POI ep I ever watched and then it prompted me to watch the whole show from the beginning
description:
- Extract from season 4 episode 11
